listitem.para: [renodr] - Adapt httpd to lua-5.4 API changes.
[renodr] - Adapt gvim to lua-5.4 API changes.
[ken] - note that building rustc can now mostly be restricted to a specified number of processors by adding a --jobs switch to each x.py command and also exporting CARGO_BUILD_JOBS= with a value.
[ken] - Pierre discovered that building firefox-78 requires that Python3 has been rebuilt after installing sqlite3.
[pierre] - Add some explanation about cracklib and pwquality to the PAM page and update shadow important note about rebuilding after PAM.

[ken] - Update to firefox-78.0esr. If updating from firefox-68esr, please read the wiki entry for firefox first. This version will expect a newer profile, but starting from a term with '--enable-downgrade' to use an existing profile seems to work. [ Security fix ] Fixes #13721.
[pierre] - Add instructions and informations for mounting lvm volumes at boot with systemd. Fixes #13730.
[bdubbs] - Archive expect, dejagnu, and tcl which are now included in LFS. Fixes #13697.
[renodr] - Apply a fix to systemd to fix segmentation faults in systemd-udevd on some platforms.
[ken] - Add a caution in the Intel microcode section, certain Skylake variants fail to boot with the latest firmware.
[ken] - Update to mutt-1.14.3 (Security fixes, also now requires lynx (or links, with adjustment) to generate manual.txt. Fixes #13672.
[renodr] - Update to libexif-0.6.22. Includes 9 security fixes. Fixes #13665.
[renodr] - Update to alsa-lib-1.2.3 and alsa-utils-1.2.3. Fixes #13657.
[ken] - Update Intel microcode to 20200609 [security fix]. If you are hosting VMs, please read the ticket to see what is and what is not fixed. Fixes #13656.
[renodr] - Move the libpwquality.so library to /lib because it is now used as an authentication module and should be available if /usr is on a separate filesystem.
[renodr] - Update to gimp-2.10.20 (including new help tarball). Fixes #13650.
[ken] - Add a note to rxvt-unicode that it ignores SIGFPE (a perl issue), this causes some tests to fail if using it to build a new LFS system.
[bdubbs] - Update to polkit-cf22af32. Allows use of js68.
[renodr] - Fix a problem in NcFTP caused by GCC-10. Credit goes to Joe Locash for determining the problem and providing a solution.
[renodr] - Fix the build of systemd-245 with GCC-10 using a patch instead of CFLAGS.
[ken] - Use parallel builds for nss-3.53. Fixes #13634.

[renodr] - Update to gnutls-3.6.14 (Security Update). This includes a fix for the expired root certificate (on 5/30/2020) that made several sites inaccessible in Epiphany and other GnuTLS users because of a logic error with regards to using a certificate with the same private key from an alternate vendor. Fixes #13635.
[ken] - Update to firefox-68.9.0 (security fixes), also used for JS68. Fixes #13609.
[bdubbs] - Add a style element to css file to make the html navigation header 'sticky' instead of scrolling.
[pierre] - Update to evolution and evolution-data-server 3.36.3. Fixes #13592.
[thomas] - Upgrade subversion-1.14.0. Drop description of Python2 bindings. Fixes #13584.
[thomas] - Add Python module py3c-1.1 (needed by subversion).
[ken] - Adapt vlc-3.0.10 for changes in Qt-5.15.
[renodr] - Update to Node.JS-12.17.0. Reinstates system ICU as well. Fixes #13576.
[renodr] - Adapt Falkon to build with Qt-5.15.
[renodr] - Update to Qt and QtWebEngine-5.15.0. Fixes #13575.
[pierre] - Update to vim-8.2.0814 to sync with lfs.
[pierre] - Update to MIT Kerberos V5-1.8.2. Fixes #13565.
[pierre] - Patch jfsutils to avoid the use of -fcommon.
[pierre] - Patch transcode to avoid the use of -fcommon.
[bdubbs] - Update to kf5 packages kio-5.70.1, ktexteditor-5.70.1, and plasma-framework-5.70.1 in non-scheduled updates.
[pierre] - Add a patch to freeglut to avoid the use of -fcommon.
[pierre] - Add a patch to lxtask to avoid the use of -fcommon.
[pierre] - Add a patch to menu-cache to fix a memory leak and avoid the use of -fcommon.
[pierre] - Fix vinagre to avoid the use of -fcommon.
[pierre] - Two fixes for sharutils: prevent a heap overflow and avoid the use of -fcommon.
[pierre] - Update to Xorg Intel Driver-20200518. Fixes a "multiple definition" error with GCC 10.
[renodr] - Fix an installation problem in gjs caused by trying to create a symlink before it's origin is installed.
[renodr] - Fix a regression in Udisks2 caused by glib-2.64. This is primarily due to encoding API changes.
[pierre] - Patch libreoffice to build with GCC 10.
[pierre] - Patch boost to allow building libreoffice with GCC 10.
[pierre] - Fix vsftpd for GCC 10. Thanks to Thomas Trepl for the sed.
[bdubbs] - Update to kf5-apps-20.04.1 including kwave and kate. Fixes #13217.
[renodr] - Fix gst-plugins-bad so that it detects neon properly at build-time.
[pierre] - Fix building dhcp with GCC-10. From a patch by Xi Ruoyao.
[renodr] - Remove invalid dependency from gdk-pixbuf. Fixes #13529.
[pierre] - Fix the build of xine-lib with GCC-10.
[pierre] - Update to Java(64 bit) and Openjdk 14.0.1+7. Java 32 still pending. Partially fixes #13530.
[renodr] - Fix the build of xf86-video-amdgpu with GCC-10.
[bdubbs] - Fix building p7zip with gcc 10. Also addresses several exiting security issues.
[renodr] - Adapt valgrind to changes in GCC-10.
[thomas] - Added a patch to fix building qtwebengine-5.14.2 with GCC-10. It also enables using system ICU again.
[ken] - Added libspiro and libuninameslist to the book. Addresses part of #13488.
[ken] - Reinstate link-shared in config.toml for rustc, it had fallen out. Thanks to Pierre for noticing.
[thomas] - Added a patch to fix building QT-5.14.2 with GCC-10.
[thomas] - Fix building xf86-video-ati and xf86-video-intel with GCC-10.
[pierre] - Make a consolidated patch for gpm.
[renodr] - Added double-conversion to the book. Fixes #13504.
[renodr] - Added gdl to the book. Fixes #13503.
[renodr] - Fix a build failure in cyrus-sasl.
[ken] - Update to firefox-68.8.0 (security fixes), also used for JS68. Fixes #13498.
[renodr] - Update to GTK+-3.24.20. Revert back to autotools per upstream's recommendations, and include the scrollbar button fix in ~/.config/gtk-3.0/gtk.css. Fixes #13459.
[renodr] - Document test suite issues in GDB with AMD processors.
[renodr] - Fix a regression in gnome-shell that causes crashes with some extensions, such as dash-to-panel, enabled.
[pierre] - Document options to prevent elogind to kill all user processes when the user logs out. This recovers the traditional behavior of commands like nohup or screen.
[thomas] - Remove switch -webengine-icu from qtwebengine instructions as current qtwebengine (5.14.2) does not compile against ICU-67.1.
[ken] - Add tlpdb tarball to install of texlive source. Fixes #13445.
[renodr] - Adapt cryptsetup to work with JSON-C-0.14.0. Fixes #13439.

[renodr] - Update the systemd units tarball to handle changes in dhcpcd's PID file location. This prevents freezing systemctl while trying to start dhcpcd as well as allows dhcpcd to function correctly.
[renodr] - Update the pdfbox/fontbox packages in fop to 2.0.19. Fixes #13401.
[bdubbs] - Clarify naming of docbook xml and dtd pages.
[renodr] - Update to audacious and audacious-plugins 4.0.1. Fixes #13367.
[ken] - Update to firefox-68.7.0 (security fixes), also used for JS68. Fixes #13368.
[ken] - Let our cairo snapshot build with automake-1.16.2. Fixes #13364.
[bdubbs] - Update to opencv and opencv_contrib 4.3.0. Fixes #13357.
[renodr] - Remove the systemctl instructions from systemd and dbus. Nobody has reported problems with them in years.
[renodr] - Added graphene to the book. Fixes #13347.
[renodr] - Added libnma to the book. Fixes #13346.
[renodr] - Moved notification-daemon to System Utilites. Fixes #13349.
[renodr] - Added the test suite to libgudev.
[renodr] - Add a patch to IBUS to allow it to function in Wayland-based desktop environments such as gnome.
[ken] - Update to rustc-1.42.0 and patch seamonkey for this. Thanks to Bruce, Pierre and Uwe for their help. Fixes #13321.
[renodr] - Add JS68 to the book. Fixes #13111. Credit goes to Xi for crafting the page.
[ken] - Use the shipped copy of llvm when building rustc-1.39.0, instead of system llvm because it fails to build with llvm-10.0.. Fixes #13320.
[bdubbs] - Update to audacious and audacious-plugins 4.0. Fixes #13295.
[bdubbs] - Update to bind9 and bind 9.16.1. Fixes #13286.
[renodr] - Fix the symbolic link creation in Seamonkey so that the symlink points to the proper icon.
[ken] - Adjust seamonkey-2.53.0 to build with rustc-1.39.0. Fixes #13271.
[ken] - Update to librsvg-2.48.0, and hence update to rustc-1.39.0. Fixes #13230.
[pierre] - Update to elogind-243.7 again (stealth update). Fixes #13154.
[pierre] - Add a patch for mutter to allow building with mesa-20.x.
[bdubbs] - Update to bind-utils and bind-9.16.0. Fixes #13170.
[pierre] - Add a patch for cogl to allow building with mesa-20.x.
[renodr] - Add a patch to fix segmentation faults when closing Kdenlive.
[renodr] - Update to alsa-lib, alsa-plugins, alsa-tools, and alsa-utils 1.2.2. Fixes #13173.
